argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_r1fnon | |- R1 Fn On |
| 2 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( R1 Fn On -> dom R1 = On ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom R1 = On |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( B e. dom R1 <-> B e. On ) |
| 5 |  | #P_r1ordg | |- ( B e. dom R1 -> ( A e. B -> ( R1 ` A ) e. ( R1 ` B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylbir | |- ( B e. On -> ( A e. B -> ( R1 ` A ) e. ( R1 ` B ) ) ) |
